application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - b) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5 / 1:1) drawings of new skirting boards with details of materials and methods as well as plans showing the locations of retained historic skirtings and the proposed locations of new skirting; f)ÿDetails of existing and proposed floor build ups in section (1:5), showing retention of historic joists, floorboards and skirting boards (which shall not be removed at any time during the works) and details of any door trimming. Drawings to include detailing of junction with architraves and skirtings; k) Details of new glazing for double glazed panels, including details of the thickness of the glazing) of Listed Building consent LB/24/02210 (External works: upgrade of air conditioning units; retrospective planning permission for replacement windows and security features; replacement glazing to windows and rooflights; additional lead coverings to parapets, side roofs and cornice decorations; render repairs; rain water pipe repairs; new mews house garden access, including formation of steps and handrail; fa‡ade and fence decorations; and solar panel installation and: Associated internal works: internal refurbishment to all rooms; new kitchens and bathrooms; demolition of internal walls; relocation of door openings; plaster mouldings and cornice upgrades to ceilings; replacement metal framed ceilings; wall enhancements with decorative wall panelling; swimming pool repairs; upgrade of building services and plant; passenger door relocation)
